learnings.what_worked_well: Multi-layer bootstrap architecture with trust tiers provides clean separation of concerns. Ed25519 signature verification using libp2p-identity integrates seamlessly with existing P2P identity. Deduplication and ranking logic straightforward to implement.
learnings.what_was_harder: Ed25519 deterministic key generation API differences between libp2p versions required careful testing. DNS TXT record parsing format needed iteration to handle edge cases. HTTP manifest schema design required balancing flexibility with security.
recommendations: Add replay protection on signed messages before mainnet (timestamps/nonces)
Replace deterministic testnet keys with real foundation keys before mainnet
Implement full DHT walk layer (currently placeholder returns empty)
Add certificate pinning for HTTP endpoints
Consider adding bootstrap peer reputation tracking
technical_debt: DHT walk layer is placeholder (returns empty, documented in code)
Trusted signer keys are deterministic testnet keys (replace before mainnet)
No replay protection on signed bootstrap messages
DNS seed configuration hardcoded (should be configurable)
